snippet: In a new exhibition in London, the likes of Anish Kapoor and Dave Eggers offer up a closer look at their beloved writing instruments — some gnawed on, others utterly pristine, all strangely beautiful.
abstract: In a new exhibition in London, the likes of Anish Kapoor and Dave Eggers offer up a closer look at their beloved writing instruments — some gnawed on, others utterly pristine, all strangely beautiful.

headline.main: What a Humble Pencil Says About Its (High-Profile) Owner
